transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Internet is fine but when I get texts they take hours to arrive. What's the problem?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text:
We will open a ticket to investigate SMS delivery delays; you should see an update within 24 hours.  
create-network-investigation  
Probable cause: SMS routing or gateway issue affecting delivery times, likely related to the local SMS center or carrier network.

transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: the 100 rupees top up is still not activated to my account what's the issue

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text:
We have re-provisioned your data; please restart your device now.  
reprovision-data  
Recharge amount 100 rupees; automatic reprovisioning attempted.
